      • init

        void init(long size,
          long updCntr,
          @Nullable
          Map<Integer,Long> cacheSizes)
        Parameters:
        size - Size to init.
        updCntr - Update counter to init.
        cacheSizes - Cache sizes if store belongs to group containing multiple caches.

                       KeyCacheObject key,
                       CacheObject val,
                       GridCacheVersion ver,

                       @Nullable

                throws IgniteCheckedException
        Parameters:

        val - Value.
        ver - Version.
        expireTime - Expire time.

        New row.

        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.

      • cursor

        GridCursor<? extends CacheDataRow> cursor(int cacheId,
                                          KeyCacheObject lower,
                                          KeyCacheObject upper,
                                          Object x)
                                   throws IgniteCheckedException
        Parameters:
        cacheId - Cache ID.
        lower - Lower bound.
        upper - Upper bound.
        x - Implementation specific argument, null always means that we need to return full detached data row.
        Returns:
        Data cursor.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If failed.
